Producer: Peter Farrelly, Robert Farrelly, Riza Aziz, Joey McFarland, Charles B. Wessler, Bradley Thomas
Screenwriter: Sean Anders, John Morris, Peter Farrelly, Robert Farrelly, Bennett Yellin, Mike Cerrone
Production Co: Joey McFarland, Conundrum Entertainment, Riza Aziz, Charles B. Wessler Entertainment
Rating: PG-13 (Language|Crude and Sexual Humor|Partial Nudity|Some Drug References)
Synopsis: In need of a new kidney and having learned that he has a long-lost daughter, dimwit Harry Dunne (Jeff Daniels) snaps his equally cretinous pal, Lloyd Christmas (Jim Carrey), out of an apparent fugue state to accompany him on a journey to find her. The witless wonders criss-cross the country using whatever mode of transportation they can find, ultimately arriving at the one place on Earth where they least belong: a summit of the world's most brilliant minds.
Title: Dumb and Dumber To
